content.html:
MEMO

TO: app developers considering #Mastodon and other #ActivityPub related apps and interfaces

Perhaps spend a day or two to add Micropub support to the platform first, then your app could potentially be used to publish to ANY website/platform that supports the W3C spec. #OpenWeb #IndieWeb #FTW

https://boffosocko.com/2022/12/07/55812480/

content.html:
Hey #TTRPG friends, how about we do something fun? Since we're all getting used to this new home, maybe we can generate some fun content together!

So, I invite everyone to make a little one-page micro dungeon/adventure and to post it with the tag #mastodungeon

(P.S. if you think this is a cool idea, please Boost this message so more folks see it)

content.html: "Marvel's Defenders of the Status Quo" [22m] is a great video essay that kinda sums up why I despise 99% of superhero media. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LpitmEnaYeU
content.value: "Marvel's Defenders of the Status Quo" [22m] is a great video essay that kinda sums up why I despise 99% of superhero media. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LpitmEnaYeU

content.html:
We call the tree "strong," even "brave."

We praise it for growing around the fence.

We never ask it if it was given a choice.

We never ask it how much it hurts to have the cold, twisted steel bored through the tree's heartwood.

"Look how strong you are, tree! So resilient!"

It is never "How terrible the pain you must feel simply by existing with a fence inside of you?"

Never "How horrible that the fence can never be removed without also killing you."

Never "I'm so sorry I built the fence"
content.value: We call the tree "strong," even "brave."We praise it for growing around the fence.We never ask it if it was given a choice.We never ask it how much it hurts to have the cold, twisted steel bored through the tree's heartwood."Look how strong you are, tree! So resilient!"It is never "How terrible the pain you must feel simply by existing with a fence inside of you?"Never "How horrible that the fence can never be removed without also killing you."Never "I'm so sorry I built the fence"
